title: User will receive an error if I'm attempting to create a Report Date for a player with an invalid MJ Roster Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN player's pending MJ Roster status is NOT, Not to Report or Not Yet Reported.
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Report Date" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN error will display "Player's roster status must be Not Yet Reported or Not To Report for this assignment."

title: User will  receive an error if the player I'm attempting to create a report date transaction for is not a MJ League player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player's pending roster status is not at the major league level
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Report Date" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN an error will display: "This transaction is for Major League players only."

title: Add a new Authorized Signatory from a Designate for Release or Assignment transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Designate for Release or Assignment tx
AND the authorized signatory field on the tx contains a list of the authorized signatories with mj tx checked off in the auth signatories widget
custom_expected:
THEN the user can enter a new Authorized Signatory for the player's Org
AND The checkbox associated with the form the user is adding a new signatory from will be auto checked and disabled

title: Action item created for club user from a transfer of option tx being submitted for Org player that requires an Addendum C to be dismissed when creating an Addendum C for the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a transfer of option tx is being submitted
custom_steps:
WHEN the player requires an Add C
AND a Add C is created
custom_expected: THEN an action item will be removed
